body:
A lot of people hate when they first walk out of spawn what look at a giant wall of wood blocking their spawn, I have experienced with a lot of them and I decided to build a anti spawn trapper.

It might be a bit laggy...

Worth tho

http://imgur.com/Wis3uyF

title: Pepe's Anti spawn trapper

replies.body: Wtf pepe that isnt worth. Almost 1000000 lag. And -100000 fps.

replies.body: If I were a spawn blocker, I would just break everything cos wynaut.
